item.title: Moo Deng, the Toddler Hippopotamus, Still Has Star Power
item.description: The pygmy hippopotamus, now 6 months old, is Thailand’s biggest celebrity, and the crowds keep flocking. What explains her charm?

item.title: Deciphering Ancient Indus Valley Script Could Earn You $1 Million
item.description: A prize offered by an Indian state leader is intended to shed light on a Bronze Age civilization — and settle a cultural battle.

item.title: Why Is Violence Flaring Up in Mineral-Rich Congo?
item.description: Rebels backed by Rwanda are seizing huge tracts of the Democratic Republic of Congo. The rebels, known as M23, say they are protecting ethnic Tutsis, ...

item.title: Trump Will Hit Mexico, Canada and China With Tariffs
item.description: The White House said it would move forward with levies on America’s largest trading partners on Saturday.
